Pre-Game Insights: Jos Buttler is out of the series with a hamstring injury, and Phil Salt will step up as captain.
Senior players in the squad are heading towards the twilight of their careers, and the coaching team is expected to decide whether to hand them early pensions or let them retire honorably.
All eyes are on whether the side has made drastic improvements since underperforming at the T20 World Cup earlier this year and failing to defend their ODI World Cup last year.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phil Salt will become the first Welsh-born cricketer to lead an international England side on Welsh soil when he takes on the Aussies in Cardiff on Friday.
The choice of ground for the final ODI is controversial, with Gloucestershire hosting a 'hybrid pitch walkthrough' to counteract claims that their surface isn't up to hosting internationals.
